text: Oleg Aleksandrovich Akulov (; born 6 January 1973) is a Russian football coach and a former player. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Zhemchuzhina Sochi players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Kuban Krasnodar players Category:FC Akhmat Grozny players Category:Russian football managers Category:FC Kristall Smolensk players Category:Association football forwards
title: Oleg Akulov
